0VP.SG.summary: Vichitbhan Palmoil Public Company Limited produces and distributes crude palm oil and kernel products in Thailand. It offers crude palm oil for palm oil refineries in to be used in the food business, such as the production of biscuits, creamer, and ice cream, as well as for shampoo manufacturing industry and used in the production of fatty acid and methyl ester. The company also provides palm kernel oils and fats, used as ingredients in the production of margarine, bread, cosmetics, and health supplements; raw materials for oleo chemicals industry; and ingredient in animal food. In addition, it offers by products, such as shells, empty bunches, decanter cakes, and palm fiber products. Further, the company is also involved in energy production by using waste water of the palm oil and biogas-powered fuel. Vichitbhan Palmoil Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

1FR.SG.summary: Seafresh Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes frozen raw shrimp, processed shrimp, and other seafood products in Thailand and internationally. It provides raw, cooked, sushi, and value added shrimp products, as well as shrimp powder and peeled head shrimp products. The company offers its products under the Seafresh, Sea Angel, GO-GO, Thai Chia, Phoenix, C Angel, and Ultra brands. It is also involved in the import and distribution of seafood; producing and selling animals feed and nutrition; consulting and installation of computer systems; and shrimp farm business. In addition, the company invests in seafood processing companies and other related business. Seafresh Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Mueang Chumphon, Thailand.

2MLC.SG.summary: Malee Group Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes canned agriculture products, fruit juices, and non-alcohol beverages in Thailand and internationally. The company offers UHT and pasteurized vegetable and fruit juices under the Malee, Malee Food Service, Malee Tropical, and Malee Coco brands; and UHT box drinking water, other beverages, and PET plastic bottles under the Malee and good water brands. It also provides UHT and pasteurized milk and milk tablets under the brand name Chockhai Farm, as well as corn milk under the Malee I-Corn brand name; and TurBusta Maxx branded canned coffee. In addition, the company offers canned seasonal fruits, including rambutan, rambutan stuffed with pineapple, lychees, longans, water chestnuts, sugar palm, mangoes, etc.; canned sweet corn; canned pineapple; and canned mixed fruits under the brand names Malee, First Choice, Farmer, and Malee Foods Service. Further, it provides research and development services for scientifically transformation agriculture solutions; and engages in the contract manufacturing business. The company was formerly known as Malee Sampran Public Company Limited and changed its name to Malee Group Public Company Limited in April 2016. Malee Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is based in Lam Luk Ka, Thailand.

CFRESH-R.BK.summary: Seafresh Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes frozen raw shrimp, processed shrimp, and other seafood products in Thailand and internationally. It provides raw, cooked, sushi, and value added shrimp products, as well as shrimp powder and peeled head shrimp products. The company offers its products under the Seafresh, Sea Angel, GO-GO, Thai Chia, Phoenix, C Angel, and Ultra brands. It is also involved in the import and distribution of seafood; producing and selling animals feed and nutrition; consulting and installation of computer systems; and shrimp farm business. In addition, the company invests in seafood processing companies and other related business. Seafresh Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Mueang Chumphon, Thailand.

CHOTI-R.BK.short_name: KIANG HUAT SEA GULL TRADING FRO
CHOTI-R.BK.long_name: Kiang Huat Sea Gull Trading Frozen Food Public Company Limited
CHOTI-R.BK.summary: Kiang Huat Sea Gull Trading Frozen Food Public Company Limited, through its subsidiary, Teppitak Seafood Company Limited, manufactures and sells frozen seafood in Asia, Europe, North America, Africa, Thailand, and internationally. The company offers various block, semi-IQF, IQF, and vacuum packed items comprising raw and cooked head-on, headless, and peeled shrimps; extended shrimps; cooked tail-on butterfly, breaded, and easy peeled shrimps; and slipper lobster tail and meat. It sells its products under the Sea King, Sea Champion, Eagle, Sea Queen, Sea Flower, and Blue Gulf brands. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Songkhla, Thailand.

CHOTI.BK.short_name: KIANG HUAT SEA GULL TRADING FRO
CHOTI.BK.long_name: Kiang Huat Sea Gull Trading Frozen Food Public Company Limited
CHOTI.BK.summary: Kiang Huat Sea Gull Trading Frozen Food Public Company Limited, through its subsidiary, Teppitak Seafood Company Limited, manufactures and sells frozen seafood in Asia, Europe, North America, Africa, Thailand, and internationally. The company offers various block, semi-IQF, IQF, and vacuum packed items comprising raw and cooked head-on, headless, and peeled shrimps; extended shrimps; cooked tail-on butterfly, breaded, and easy peeled shrimps; and slipper lobster tail and meat. It sells its products under the Sea King, Sea Champion, Eagle, Sea Queen, Sea Flower, and Blue Gulf brands. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Songkhla, Thailand.

CM-R.BK.long_name: Chiangmai Frozen Foods Public Company Limited
CM-R.BK.summary: Chiangmai Frozen Foods Public Company Limited manufactures and exports frozen vegetables in Thailand. It offers soy beans, green beans, sweet corn, baby corn, and mixed vegetables. Chiangmai Frozen Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CM.BK.long_name: Chiangmai Frozen Foods Public Company Limited
CM.BK.summary: Chiangmai Frozen Foods Public Company Limited manufactures and exports frozen vegetables in Thailand. It offers soy beans, green beans, sweet corn, baby corn, and mixed vegetables. Chiangmai Frozen Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

DOD-R.BK.summary: DOD Biotech Public Company Limited engages in the food supplements and health drinks business in Thailand. The company provides skin care products, dietary supplements for body shape, and health food supplements. It also offers nutritional supplements under the brand name Daeto. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

GFPT-R.BK.summary: GFPT Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes frozen and cooked chicken products in Thailand and internationally. The company is involved in the chicken evisceration activities; producing and distributing processed chicken food and by-products; and operating a feed mill and parent chicken farm for egg production and distribution. It also operates a grandparent chicken farm for parent stock chicks production and distribution; a parent chicken farm and hatchery for chicks production and distribution; and a broiler farm. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GFPT.BK.summary: GFPT Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes frozen and cooked chicken products in Thailand and internationally. The company is involved in the chicken evisceration activities; producing and distributing processed chicken food and by-products; and operating a feed mill and parent chicken farm for egg production and distribution. It also operates a grandparent chicken farm for parent stock chicks production and distribution; a parent chicken farm and hatchery for chicks production and distribution; and a broiler farm. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KASET-R.BK.summary: Thai Ha Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes agricultural products, processed agricultural products, and instant products in Thailand and internationally. The company's products include rice; vermicelli noodles; bean vermicelli; vegetable oil; rice porridge seasoning; rice porridge; green mung bean; jasmine, white, brown, and glutinous rice; and snacks. It offers its products primarily under the KASET, SMART CHEF, IMPERIAL TASTE, FIRST LADY, COCO RIZ, COCO JAS, and COCO RICE brands. In addition, it operates rice mill business, and rice processing plant, as well as exports rice. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Thai Ha Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Cheer Group Holding Co., Ltd.

KASET.BK.summary: Thai Ha Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes agricultural products, processed agricultural products, and instant products in Thailand and internationally. Thai Ha Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Cheer Group Holding Co., Ltd.

LEE-R.BK.short_name: LEE FEED MILL PUBLIC COMPANY LI
LEE-R.BK.long_name: Lee Feed Mill Public Company Limited
LEE-R.BK.summary: Lee Feed Mill Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes animal feed primarily in Thailand. The company provides pet food, livestock feed, and aquatic feed products. It offers products in concentrated pellet and powder forms to livestock and aquaculture industries, as well as concentrated feed for swine, chickens, ducks, cattle, fish, frogs, and shrimps under the Lee, Win, Max, and Pro-grade brand names. The company is also involved in breeding broiler chicks; crop drying, silo grain storage, experimental farming, and crop farming, as well as rental farming businesses; and the distribution of raw materials for the animal feed manufacturers. It also sells its products in the Lao People's Democratic Republic, the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, and the Kingdom of Cambodia. Lee Feed Mill Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MALEE-R.BK.summary: Malee Group Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes canned agriculture products, fruit juices, and non-alcohol beverages in Thailand and internationally. The company offers UHT and pasteurized vegetable and fruit juices under the Malee, Malee Food Service, Malee Tropical, and Malee Coco brands; and UHT box drinking water, other beverages, and PET plastic bottles under the Malee and good water brands. It also provides UHT and pasteurized milk and milk tablets under the brand name Chockhai Farm, as well as corn milk under the Malee I-Corn brand name; and TurBusta Maxx branded canned coffee. In addition, the company offers canned seasonal fruits, including rambutan, rambutan stuffed with pineapple, lychees, longans, water chestnuts, sugar palm, mangoes, etc.; canned sweet corn; canned pineapple; and canned mixed fruits under the brand names Malee, First Choice, Farmer, and Malee Foods Service. Further, it provides research and development services for scientifically transformation agriculture solutions; and engages in the contract manufacturing business. The company was formerly known as Malee Sampran Public Company Limited and changed its name to Malee Group Public Company Limited in April 2016. Malee Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is based in Lam Luk Ka, Thailand.

NRF-R.BK.long_name: NR Instant Produce Public Company Limited
NRF-R.BK.summary: NR Instant Produce Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes seasonings and instant food products in Thailand, the United States, Europe, and internationally. It offers sauces, condiments, and curries under the Por Kwan brand; soups, pastes, sauces, and condiments under the Lee brand; ready to eat meals under the Thai Delight brand; and teas under the Dede brand. The company also provides co-packing services and private label products. It exports its products to approximately 25 countries. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

NRF.BK.long_name: NR Instant Produce Public Company Limited
NRF.BK.summary: NR Instant Produce Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes seasonings and instant food products in Thailand, the United States, Europe, and internationally. It offers sauces, condiments, and curries under the Por Kwan brand; soups, pastes, sauces, and condiments under the Lee brand; ready to eat meals under the Thai Delight brand; and teas under the Dede brand. The company also provides co-packing services and private label products. It exports its products to approximately 25 countries. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

NVAP.F.long_name: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited
NVAP.F.summary: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells frozen, chilled, and canned seafood in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Ambient Seafood; Frozen and Chilled Seafood and Related Businesses; and Pet food, Value-Added and Other Businesses. It offers ambient seafood products, including tuna, sardines, salmon, mackerel, and herring for retail and wholesale customers; frozen and chilled seafood, such as shrimp, lobster, and crab directly to restaurants, hotels, and caterers; ready-to-cook or ready-to-serve products, as well as bakery treats; marine ingredients; and pet care products comprising surimi-based fish snacks, canned cod liver, and wet seafood-based cat and dog foods. The company provides its products under the Chicken of the Sea, Genova, John West, Petit Navire, Parmentier, King Oscar, Mareblu, RÃ¼gen Fisch, Sealect, Fisho, QFresh, Monori, Bellotta, and Marvo brands. It also imports and sells shrimp and other frozen seafood products to restaurant chains, retailers, and wholesalers, as well as exports canned seafood, tuna, canned sardines, and mackerel; manufactures and distributes smoked and chilled salmon, animal feed, and aquatic animals; rents properties; refines tuna oil; and provides logistic, training and management, e-commerce, printing manufacturing, technical, food products packaging, and business strategy and investment consulting services. The company was formerly known as Thai Union Frozen Products Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Union Group Public Company Limited in September 2015. Thai Union Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

PB-R.BK.summary: President Bakery Public Company Limited manufactures and sells bakery products in Thailand. Its bakery products include sliced and snack breads, filled flavored bread, and readymade sandwiches; burger and hot dog buns; snack cakes; confectionery products; fried products; and fast food and catering products. The company also provides products based on order placed by restaurants, food group chains, and coffee shops. In addition, it retails its products under the Deliya by Farmhouse name, Madame Marco cake, Good Morning Farmhouse, Farmhouse Moon Cake, and Farmhouse brand names; and restaurants under the Saboten name. The company also exports bakery products. President Bakery Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. President Bakery Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thai President Foods Public Company Limited.

PB.BK.summary: President Bakery Public Company Limited manufactures and sells bakery products in Thailand. Its bakery products include sliced and snack breads, filled flavored bread, and readymade sandwiches; burger and hot dog buns; snack cakes; confectionery products; fried products; and fast food and catering products. The company also provides products based on order placed by restaurants, food group chains, and coffee shops. In addition, it retails its products under the Deliya by Farmhouse name, Madame Marco cake, Good Morning Farmhouse, Farmhouse Moon Cake, and Farmhouse brand names; and restaurants under the Saboten name. The company also exports bakery products. President Bakery Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. President Bakery Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thai President Foods Public Company Limited.

PPPM-R.BK.summary: PP PRIME Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes feeds for aquatic animals and pets in Thailand and Japan. The company operates in three segments: Aquatic Animal Feed; Pets Food; and Production and Distribution of Electricity. It offers black tiger and other shrimp feed products; fish and frog feed products; and dog and cat food products. The company also distributes raw materials for animal feed; generates geothermal power; and offers business consulting and management services. In addition, it invests in wind power and other energy businesses. The company was formerly known as Thai Luxe Enterprises Public Company Limited and changed its name to PP PRIME Public Company Limited in September 2018. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Muang, Thailand.

PPPM.BK.summary: PP PRIME Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes feeds for aquatic animals and pets in Thailand and Japan. The company operates in three segments: Aquatic Animal Feed; Pets Food; and Production and Distribution of Electricity. It offers black tiger and other shrimp feed products; fish and frog feed products; and dog and cat food products. The company also distributes raw materials for animal feed; generates geothermal power; and offers business consulting and management services. In addition, it invests in wind power and other energy businesses. The company was formerly known as Thai Luxe Enterprises Public Company Limited and changed its name to PP PRIME Public Company Limited in September 2018. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Muang, Thailand.

PRG-R.BK.long_name: Patum Rice Mill and Granary Public Company Limited
PRG-R.BK.summary: Patum Rice Mill and Granary Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the processing and packaging of rice and related business in Thailand, the United States, Canada, Europe, the Asia Pacific, and internationally. It operates through two segments, Improving the Quality and Packaging of Milled Rice, and Food Center Business. It offers organic, Japanese, and quinoa rice, as well as rice berry granola; maboonkrong plus, white, hom mali, and other rice products; and other products, such as NUTRA ORIS 10 capsules, as well as drinking water. The company is also involved in the operation of a restaurant and food center; rental of a factory building, warehouse, and plant; provision of transportation services; and distribution of rice. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand. Patum Rice Mill and Granary Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of MBK Public Company Limited.

PRG.BK.long_name: Patum Rice Mill and Granary Public Company Limited
PRG.BK.summary: Patum Rice Mill and Granary Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the processing and packaging of rice and related business in Thailand, the United States, Canada, Europe, the Asia Pacific, and internationally. It operates through two segments, Improving the Quality and Packaging of Milled Rice, and Food Center Business. It offers organic, Japanese, and quinoa rice, as well as rice berry granola; maboonkrong plus, white, hom mali, and other rice products; and other products, such as NUTRA ORIS 10 capsules, as well as drinking water. The company is also involved in the operation of a restaurant and food center; rental of a factory building, warehouse, and plant; provision of transportation services; and distribution of rice. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand. Patum Rice Mill and Granary Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of MBK Public Company Limited.

RBF-R.BK.long_name: R&B Food Supply Public Company Limited
RBF-R.BK.summary: R&B Food Supply Public Company Limited manufactures and trades in bread products, colors, fragrances, and chemicals in Thailand. It offers breadcrumbs to enhance the taste of meat, seafood, vegetables, and other products. The company serves food, beverage, and consumer product industries, as well as hotel business. R&B Food Supply Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

RBF.BK.long_name: R&B Food Supply Public Company Limited
RBF.BK.summary: R&B Food Supply Public Company Limited manufactures and trades in bread products, colors, fragrances, and chemicals in Thailand. It offers breadcrumbs to enhance the taste of meat, seafood, vegetables, and other products. The company serves food, beverage, and consumer product industries, as well as hotel business. R&B Food Supply Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SAUCE-R.BK.summary: Thaitheparos Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes sauces and condiments in Thailand and internationally. It offers seasoning food products under the Golden Mountain brand, including seasoning sauces, chilli sauces, distilled vinegar products, tomato ketchups, chilli and tomato sauces, and oyster sauces, as well as fermented soy sauces and powdering sauces, and fermented soy sauce powders; chilli sauces under the Sriraja Panich brand; and Japanese soy sauce under the Kinzan Shoyu brand. The company was formerly known as Thai Theparos Food Products Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thaitheparos Public Company Limited in April 2011. Thaitheparos Public Company Limited was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Muang, Thailand.

SAUCE.BK.summary: Thaitheparos Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes sauces and condiments in Thailand and internationally. It offers seasoning food products under the Golden Mountain brand, including seasoning sauces, chilli sauces, distilled vinegar products, tomato ketchups, chilli and tomato sauces, and oyster sauces, as well as fermented soy sauces and powdering sauces, and fermented soy sauce powders; chilli sauces under the Sriraja Panich brand; and Japanese soy sauce under the Kinzan Shoyu brand. SFP-R.BK.long_name: Siam Food Products Public Company Limited
SFP-R.BK.summary: Siam Food Products Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, grows, manufactures, and distributes processed food from agricultural products. Its products include pineapples in cans; aseptic and plastic bags; pineapple juice concentrates; other fruits in can and plastic cups; and canned pineapple juices, as well as animal feeds. The company is also involved in the commercial and investment activities. It also exports its products to the United States, the United Kingdom, Japan, Scandinavia, Germany, the Netherlands, France, Italy, and Spain. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Siam Food Products Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Plantheon Company Limited.

SORKON-R.BK.long_name: S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited
SORKON-R.BK.summary: S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes processed food products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Production Food From Pork, Processed Seafood, Restaurants, and Swine Farm. It offers seafood, such as fish, shrimp, and squid balls under the Taechiew, Kwangchow, Kowloon, Mahachai, Odeng, Shanghai, Kaizen, Hong Kong, and Taipei brands, as well as chili pastes and dips under the Thai Doem and Thai Niyom brands; pork and chicken snack products, including roasted pork crisps, seasoned roasted pork, and pork cracklings under the EntreÃ© and S. Khonkaen brands; and roasted chicken under the Zaap Classic brand. The company also provides ready-to-eat and frozen food items; other OEM products; and Thai native foods. In addition, it is involved in breeding and selling of finishing swine; food and beverage distribution; and restaurant and franchise businesses, as well as offers training and seminar services. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 12 quick service restaurants. S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SORKON.BK.long_name: S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited
SORKON.BK.summary: S. Khonkaen Foods Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes processed food products in Thailand and internationally. SST-R.BK.short_name: SUB SRI THAI PUBLIC COMPANY LIM
SST-R.BK.long_name: Sub Sri Thai Public Company Limited
SST-R.BK.summary: Sub Sri Thai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in food and beverage, warehouse and wharf, and garment businesses in Thailand and internationally. The Food and Beverage segment produces and distributes snacks, drinks, and ice cream, as well as operates restaurants. This segment also operates as a franchise holder of Au Bon Pain, a bakery outlet; Dunkin' Donuts, a bakery shop; and Baskin Robbins, an ice cream shop. The Warehouse and Wharf segment offers document and electronic media storage services; warehouse rental and management services; and other services, such as wharfing, weighing, stevedoring, fertilizers blending, and packing and loading services, as well as cargo deposit services. The Garment segment designs, produces, and distributes clothing and leather products. The company also engages in trust fund management activities. Sub Sri Thai Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TC-R.BK.summary: Tropical Canning (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and trades in canned and pouched seafood products in Thailand and internationally. The company is based in Hat Yai, Thailand.

TC.BK.summary: Tropical Canning (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and trades in canned and pouched seafood products in Thailand and internationally. The company is based in Hat Yai, Thailand.

TFMAMA-R.BK.long_name: Thai President Foods Public Company Limited
TFMAMA-R.BK.summary: Thai President Foods Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes instant noodles, biscuits and wafers, and instant foods in Thailand. The company also offers fruit juices, biscuits, wheat flour, and packaging materials for food and paper cups, as well as bread and bakery products. In addition, it is involved in the real estate investment business. The company also exports its products to rest of Asia, Australia, Europe, Canada, America, and Africa. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company provides its products under the Chicken of the Sea, Genova, John West, Petit Navire, Parmentier, King Oscar, Mareblu, RÃ¼gen Fisch, Sealect, Fisho, QFresh, Monori, Bellotta, and Marvo brands. It also imports and sells shrimp and other frozen seafood products to restaurant chains, retailers, and wholesalers, as well as exports canned seafood, tuna, canned sardines, and mackerel; manufactures and distributes smoked and chilled salmon, animal feed, and aquatic animals; rents properties; refines tuna oil; and provides logistic, training and management, e-commerce, printing manufacturing, technical, food products packaging, and business strategy and investment consulting services. The company was formerly known as Thai Union Frozen Products Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Union Group Public Company Limited in September 2015. Thai Union Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

TKN-R.BK.long_name: Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited
TKN-R.BK.summary: Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes fried, grilled, and baked seaweed and seaweed snacks in Thailand, China, Malaysia, Indonesia, Vietnam, the United States, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Snacks, Retailer, and Others. It also operates as a retailer of snacks, and food and beverage products. In addition, the company is involved in the distribution of snacks and souvenirs; manufacture and distribution of seasoning powders; and restaurant business. Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Lat Lum Kaeo, Thailand.

TKN.BK.long_name: Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited
TKN.BK.summary: Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes fried, grilled, and baked seaweed and seaweed snacks in Thailand, China, Malaysia, Indonesia, Vietnam, the United States, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Snacks, Retailer, and Others. It also operates as a retailer of snacks, and food and beverage products. In addition, the company is involved in the distribution of snacks and souvenirs; manufacture and distribution of seasoning powders; and restaurant business. Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Lat Lum Kaeo, Thailand.

TU-R.BK.long_name: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited
TU-R.BK.summary: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells frozen, chilled, and canned seafood in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Ambient Seafood; Frozen and Chilled Seafood and Related Businesses; and Pet food, Value-Added and Other Businesses. It offers ambient seafood products, including tuna, sardines, salmon, mackerel, and herring for retail and wholesale customers; frozen and chilled seafood, such as shrimp, lobster, and crab directly to restaurants, hotels, and caterers; ready-to-cook or ready-to-serve products, as well as bakery treats; marine ingredients; and pet care products comprising surimi-based fish snacks, canned cod liver, and wet seafood-based cat and dog foods. The company provides its products under the Chicken of the Sea, Genova, John West, Petit Navire, Parmentier, King Oscar, Mareblu, RÃ¼gen Fisch, Sealect, Fisho, QFresh, Monori, Bellotta, and Marvo brands. It also imports and sells shrimp and other frozen seafood products to restaurant chains, retailers, and wholesalers, as well as exports canned seafood, tuna, canned sardines, and mackerel; manufactures and distributes smoked and chilled salmon, animal feed, and aquatic animals; rents properties; refines tuna oil; and provides logistic, training and management, e-commerce, printing manufacturing, technical, food products packaging, and business strategy and investment consulting services. The company was formerly known as Thai Union Frozen Products Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Union Group Public Company Limited in September 2015. Thai Union Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

TVO-R.BK.long_name: Thai Vegetable Oil Public Company Limited
TVO-R.BK.summary: Thai Vegetable Oil Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes soy meal and soybean oil in primarily in Thailand. It provides soybean oil for household cooking purposes, as well as corn, sunflower, and canola oils under the A-NGOON brand; soybean meal for the production of animal feed under the TVO Hipro Â Meal brand; and vegetable oils under the Healthy Chef and Queen brands. The company also offers olive oils under the MONINI brand; dehulled soymeal under the TVO Dehulled Soymeal brand; full fat soy under the TVO Full Fat Soy brand; TVO soy hull and lecithin products; and fish canned products. In addition, it manufactures and distributes packaging products; and distributes consumer products. Thai Vegetable Oil Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TWPC-R.BK.summary: Thai Wah Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes starch and other agricultural products in Thailand, Vietnam, Cambodia, and China. Its products include tapioca starch, which is used in the food industry, such as seasoning powder and sweetener products, as well as in other industries, such as paper and textile; tapioca pearl that is used in cooking savory dishes and desserts; alpha starch, which is used in the aquatic animal feed, mosquito repellent, and metal casting industries; and glucose and candy products. The company also provides vermicelli, bean vermicelli, rice vermicelli, rice flour, roselle flower, pandanus leaf, and other products. In addition, it is also involved in land holding activities; and generation and sale of electricity; and wholesale trading of tapioca starch products, rice flour products, and other starch-related products. Thai Wah Public Company Limited was founded in 1947 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

VPO-R.BK.summary: Vichitbhan Palmoil Public Company Limited produces and distributes crude palm oil and kernel products in Thailand. It offers crude palm oil for palm oil refineries in to be used in the food business, such as the production of biscuits, creamer, and ice cream, as well as for shampoo manufacturing industry and used in the production of fatty acid and methyl ester. The company also provides palm kernel oils and fats, used as ingredients in the production of margarine, bread, cosmetics, and health supplements; raw materials for oleo chemicals industry; and ingredient in animal food. In addition, it offers by products, such as shells, empty bunches, decanter cakes, and palm fiber products. Further, the company is also involved in energy production by using waste water of the palm oil and biogas-powered fuel. Vichitbhan Palmoil Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WINNER-R.BK.long_name: Winner Group Enterprise Public Company Limited
WINNER-R.BK.summary: Winner Group Enterprise Public Company Limited manufactures, imports, and distributes raw materials, ingredients, food chemicals, and consumer products in Thailand. It offers cocoa butter, liquor, and powder; couverture and compound chocolate; chocolate chips, spreads, and fillings; raisins, cranberries, cashew nuts, almonds, and rolled oats; egg white, egg yolk, and whole egg powders; popcorns, cooking papers, and pumpkin powder; margarine and shortening; seasoning products; glazing powder, maltodextrin, dextrose, aspatame, acesulfame K, and sucralose; potato, wheat, and corn starch; wheat flour and gluten; potato granules; icing, ground, and donut sugar; whipping creams; and bread improvers, yeasts, and baking powders. The company also provides carboxy methyl cellulose, carrageenan, gellan gum, pectin, and xanthan gum; potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, and phosphate preservatives; powder drinks; baking ingredients; and batter mix, pancake mix, and creamy custard powder. In addition, it offers frozen and chilled products, comprising of fruits and vegetables, French fries, meat and seafood, cheese, and bakery products. The company also offers consumer food products, such as microwave popcorn, granular bars, seasoned laver, pasta, olive oil, fruit jams, juices, etc., as well as semi-processed raw materials and frozen products, gourmet foods and bakeries, and beverages and drinks under the Bel Normande, Betty Crocker, Clos Pons, Campagna, EL Avion, Fruit by the Foot, Golden Pot, Gemez Suki, Harvey Fresh, Ital Lemon, Kimnori, Langers, Le Sang Des Seigneurs, La Espanola, Nature Valley, Ohigya, Old El Paso, Osterberg, Olivia, Pearl River Bridge, Pop Secret, Pons, Romulo, Reggia, Streamline, Sea Friend, Serpis, Teekane, VFOODS, and Yummyto brands. In addition, it manufactures skincare and cosmetic products, makeup, supplementary foods, and pharmaceuticals. Winner Group Enterprise Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

XO-R.BK.summary: Exotic Food Public Company Limited manufactures, trades, and exports various food products. Its products include dipping and cooking marinate sauces, salad dressing and oils, wok sauce, cooking pastes, cooking essentials, herbs and spices, fruits and vegetables, heat and serve, noodles, stir fry sauces and curry sauce, snacks, and Japanese range of products, as well as seasonings, fruit juices, and canned products. The company offers its products under the Exotic Food, Thai Pride, and Coco-Loto brands. It operates in Europe, North America, and Asia. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.
